SLURRY, IT MAY BE DESIRED TO SPRAY SLURRY WITH THE FRONT SPRAY BAR.
TO DO THIS OPERATION, YOU WILL NEED TO CONTINUE AGITATION WHILE
SPRAYING.  YOU WILL USE THE AGITATOR FUNCTION ON SELECTOR VALVE #1
AND THE “REAR SPRAY BAR” FUNCTION ON SELECTOR VALVE #2 BUT CONNECT
THE FRONT SPRAY BAR HOSE (GREEN BAND) TO THE REAR SPRAY BAR OUTLET
(ORANGE) ON THE BACK OF THE POWER UNIT.
NOTE: YOU WILL ONLY BE ABLE TO DISPENSE SLURRY THROUGH EITHER THE
FRONT OR REAR SPRAY BAR BUT NOT BOTH AT THE SAME TIME. DO NOT USE A
